name: r19.21be
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version.) (Contributed by NM, 21-Nov-1994.)
